data.text: @karsatov @lisa_iannattone Well, nature does not really care if you agree with its plan. The virus will circulate for eternity, and the illusion that masks will forever protect, is pretty laughable. You are welcome to try, but you will be disappointed. 🤷‍♂️

@lisa_iannattone They are not much increased compared to other ILI we have happily lived with for the past decades.

And no one has moved the goalpost. "Not catching Covid ever in you life" was never a viable option. Yes, you will get it too.
@lisa_iannattone Is there documentation on breakthrough covid being more prone to long covid?
@lisa_iannattone It is political and it’s bipartisan.

@karsatov @vet_dot @lisa_iannattone It’s not. I just gave a Girl Scout that came to my door a large envelope containing 2 new pink KN95 masks with a note saying “Please keep yourself safe, Sincerely, A Covid ward nurse”,& $25 for the 5 boxes of cookies. I hope my house doesn’t get vandalized 😬

@karsatov @lisa_iannattone Exactly, some people take months to get it back (if they ever even get it back). There's also heart damage, breathing issues, fatigue, strokes, increased risk of developing diabetes, etc. 10-30% of those who "recover" get #LongCovid. This is serious, but our govts don't care.
